reviewText: Excellent. The merchandise was new and priced right. I am very pleased.

This DVD arrived approx. five days from placing the order. It was packaged well and in excellent condition. If you are interested in prophetic end time events, this DVD expounds on some of what the Bible says about eschatology.

The information on this DVD has been so awesomely collected and presented that I have seen it with pleasure repeatedly.  The pyramid connection to the end times and its ancient roots in spirituality was absolutely enlightening, as it should be.  Heron's presentation in this documentary/movie shows extensive knowledge of thousands of years of history gathered in only the few short years he had to put it together.  Other teachers on the DVD give great testimony on the subject.  Quite frankly, the best end-times DVD yet.
A lot of these works are basically say the same thing .

If someone takes even a few minutes to stand back and look at the world around us, ... and if you have even a basic knowledge of Bible prophecy, then this does a good job of connecting the two. The main problem is prophecy is being fulfilled so rapidly in our life times, that like this video, information can rapidly become outdated. What it does do, that is important, is help to understand why we should be paying attention, and striving to be up to date, and looking for the answer: End Times: How close are we?

I have believed for years that my generation will be alive to see the rapture, although I can't prove that,the biblical evidence suggests that, and some of these prophecies are shared in this video, and the fulfillment of those prophecies are shown being fullfiled in our lifetime, suggesting we're living in the Times the prophets spoke about, and on my mind confirming my belief that CHRIST could return in my lifetime. This video is a prophetic study that will get the wheels turning, and hopefully revive a urgency to which for JESUS which is what we're supposed to be doing, watching and waiting.

the Kingdom of God is not a pyramid; it is a palace / castle made out of gold because I have seen it. This presentation is right on many facts but u can repent if u take the mark of the beast written in Revelations God waited for those to repent that took the mark; Jesus also plucks from the lake of fire daily. All hope is not loss. God will not be deprived from having people who want him. The false prophet is the Roman Catholic Pope, and the Beast is the devil. Yes, the pope plans to sign agreements for peace with all of the middle eastern countries including Israel and then rebuild the temple of God and sit on God;s throne. He is already calling him self Father in which Jesus stated in Matthew 23:9 call no man father except God in Heaven.  The pope tries to be the Holy Ghost which is God's Holy spirit sent to man kind after Jesus died as the comforter. So now the pope has clearly taken both spots belonging to God. The pope also gets people to worship angels calling on them for prayers and help. many many blasphemies has the pope persona made against God and also changing God's Holy commandments.

This video was really interesting. It captured my attention from the very beginning. I like how they stuck to the bible and not just what they thought. Although they did at times give their opinions of what they felt the scriptures meant it was not like they were trying to take the audience on a rollercoaster ride of information. They stuck to what the bible says and presented the information clearly and distinctively. Something to really think about. May God get all the glory.

This was an excellent presentation of the end times.  Dr. Price's explanations of Biblical prophecy and end times provides the viewers with an exciting introduction to the end times.  I would recommend this video to Christians and non-Christians alike.

For about one hour, the video did well to cover enough. The issue of the timing of the tribulation is interesting. Though this documentary did not take a stance, much weight was given to post-tribulation, which I believe is Biblically more credited. Coverage of the pyramids was also interesting. This is my first from that perspective.

End Times How Close Are We may be too preachy for some people to identify with. There is a way to talk about God without coming across as self-righteous, boastful, and all knowing. God is not a politician or movie star, so public boasting and bragging isn't going to cut the cake. Showy words designed to flatter God and sincere acts of glorifying Him are two different Arcs. Jesus delivered his gospel without  being preachy, so his disciples should be able to do the same. However, the End Times prophecy about the end of the preaching work makes sense and could be the reason that so many people don't want to hear preachy, self-righteous boasting. I'll pass on End Times How Close Are We.

This was informative and true to the words of God. One of the best things is the reference to the Bible so you can go back and read for yourself. God wants us to be ready. The end times are near. Not enough churches speak on but now is the time to get ready.
